title: The Explosives (Control of Manufacture) Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-explosives-control-of-manufacture-act | Legal areas: Defence and National Security

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Explosives (Control Shorttitle.
of Manufacture) Act.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                                      Interprcta-
                                                                       tion.
“licence” means a licence in writing to manufacture
     explosives;
“explosives” means any of the following substances-
     gunpowder, nitro-glycerine, dynamite, gun-cotton,
     blasting powder, fulminate of mercury or of other
     metals, coloured fires, and every other substance
     whether similar to those above mentioned or not, used
     or manufactured with a view to produce a practical
     effect, and includes fog signals, fireworks, fuses,
     rockets, percussion caps, detonators, cartridges.
     ammunition of all descriptions, lucifer matches, and
     every adaptation or preparation of an explosive as
     above defined.

provisions.title: Section 9
provisions.content:
9. Any person who contravenes any provision of this Penalties.
Act in respect whereof no penalty has been prescribed or
any regulation or rule made under this Act shall be liable
to a penalty of not less than twenty dollars and not
exceeding two hundred dollars; and all penalties under this
Act may be recovered in a summary manner in the parish
where the penalty was incurred.
